languages.text: {n}Девушка, отряхнув платье и приняв приличествующую позу, смотрит прямо перед собой. Несмотря на потрясение, ее губы плотно сжаты, а спина безупречно пряма.{/n}
{n}Having dusted herself off and reassumed a proper bearing, Maive stares off into space. Despite the shock, her lips are pressed together firmly, and her back is impeccably straight.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Девушка, отряхнув платье и приняв приличествующую позу, смотрит прямо перед собой. Несмотря на потрясение, ее губы плотно сжаты, а спина безупречно пряма.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Having dusted herself off and restored proper bearing, Maive stares off into space. Despite the shock, her lips are pressed together firmly and her back is impeccably straight.{/n}
{n}Having dusted herself off and restored proper bearing, Maive stares off into space. Despite the shock, her lips are pressed together firmly and her back is impeccably straight.{/n}

{n}Having dusted herself off and reassumed a proper bearing, Maive stares off into space. Despite the shock, her lips are pressed together firmly, and her back is impeccably straight.{/n}

languages.text: {n}梅芙掸掉了身上的灰尘，重新恢复了冷静，凝视着远方。尽管她受到了惊吓，但她依然紧紧地抿着嘴唇，挺直了脊背，仪态无可挑剔。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Having dusted herself off and reassumed a proper bearing, Maive stares off into space. Despite the shock, her lips are pressed together firmly, and her back is impeccably straight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}梅芙掸掉了身上的灰尘，重新恢复了冷静，凝视着远方。尽管她受到了惊吓，但她依然紧紧地抿着嘴唇，挺直了脊背，仪态无可挑剔。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tras sacudirse el polvo y recobrar la compostura, Maive se queda inmóvil con la mirada perdida. A pesar de la impresión, tiene los labios apretados y la espalda erguida en una postura impecable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Having dusted herself off and reassumed a proper bearing, Maive stares off into space. Despite the shock, her lips are pressed together firmly, and her back is impeccably straight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras sacudirse el polvo y recobrar la compostura, Maive se queda inmóvil con la mirada perdida. A pesar de la impresión, tiene los labios apretados y la espalda erguida en una postura impecable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Üstünü başını toparlayıp düzgün bir duruş sergileyen Maive, boşluğa bakıyor. İçinde bulunduğu şok hâline rağmen dudakları sıkıca kapalı, sırtıysa kusursuzca dik.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Having dusted herself off and reassumed a proper bearing, Maive stares off into space. Despite the shock, her lips are pressed together firmly, and her back is impeccably straight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Üstünü başını toparlayıp düzgün bir duruş sergileyen Maive, boşluğa bakıyor. İçinde bulunduğu şok hâline rağmen dudakları sıkıca kapalı, sırtıysa kusursuzca dik.{/n}

languages.text: {n}メイヴは埃を落とすと適切な身のこなしを取り戻し、じっと宙を見据える。ショックにもかかわらず、彼女の唇は固く結ばれ、背筋は真っ直ぐにのばしている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Having dusted herself off and reassumed a proper bearing, Maive stares off into space. Despite the shock, her lips are pressed together firmly, and her back is impeccably straight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}メイヴは埃を落とすと適切な身のこなしを取り戻し、じっと宙を見据える。ショックにもかかわらず、彼女の唇は固く結ばれ、背筋は真っ直ぐにのばしている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Après s'être époussetée et avoir repris contenance, Maive fixe l'horizon d'un regard lointain. Malgré le choc, elle pince les lèvres d'un air digne et se tient le dos parfaitement droit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Having dusted herself off and reassumed a proper bearing, Maive stares off into space. Despite the shock, her lips are pressed together firmly, and her back is impeccably straight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Après s'être époussetée et avoir repris contenance, Maive fixe l'horizon d'un regard lointain. Malgré le choc, elle pince les lèvres d'un air digne et se tient le dos parfaitement droit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nachdem sie sich den Staub abgeklopft und wieder Haltung angenommen hat, starrt Maive ins Leere. Trotz des Schocks sind ihre Lippen fest zusammengepresst und ihr Rücken ist makellos gerade.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Having dusted herself off and reassumed a proper bearing, Maive stares off into space. Despite the shock, her lips are pressed together firmly, and her back is impeccably straight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nachdem sie sich den Staub abgeklopft und wieder Haltung angenommen hat, starrt Maive ins Leere. Trotz des Schocks sind ihre Lippen fest zusammengepresst und ihr Rücken ist makellos gerade.{/n}
